title: Bagels and Beans
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of Dutch-owned restaurant chain, offering mostly vegetarian suitable food with several vegan choices. Almost everything is organic and/or fair-trade. Bagels, salads, juices, coffee and tea. English spoken. Accepts Mastercard only but not Visa.
